recipesJson.name: Rum Figgy Pudding
recipesJson.author: TamVapes
recipesJson.description:
A fig Bread Pudding with rum sauce. 
Just in time for Christmas and New Years. This is particularly boozy for a shake n Vape, and delicious; however if you can let it steep for a few days for the pudding, fig, and rum to meld in with the dough of the bread pudding and sweet dough, it will be mind blowing. The pumpkin spice adds a perfect flavor for a holiday feel. I love this spice. No sweetener is needed for this, unless you just canâ€™t live without it. ðŸ˜€. 
Peace to everyone. Merry Christmas and Happy New Year.
